name: YoYo's crazy quest
description:
Yotaro's Controls: Q:Barrage(10 second cool down), W:Kick, E:Punch, A:Move left, S:Crouch, D:Move right, Space bar:Jump

NIO's controls: Num7: Time stop(5 second cool down), Num8:Kick, Num9:Punch,

Num4:Move left, Num5:Crouch, Num6:Move right, Num0:Jump

In order to use Yotaro or NIO's special moves, you have to hold down the Key until the animation is complete. 

Special Thanks to Ruberg for helping with the complicated scripts.
